LanguageData.O21_MoonCycle_FullMoonDesc: The planet's moon, {0}, has reached its most clearly visible form. Colonists will receive minor mood boosts.
LanguageData.O21_MoonCycle_CurrentPhaseDesc: Each moon on your colony's planet, {0}, has a moon cycle. At the end of the cycle, a beautiful full moon will be visible to your colony.\n\nBe aware that many cultures have associated a full moon with supernatural occurences that may have a basis in reality...
